nodes.text: The Nocombackie Law (also called the Not-Coming-Back Law or Gungan Law of Banishment) was a ruling handed down by the Gungan High Council. It banished the accused from ever returning to a Gungan city, on pain of death. Boss Rugor Nass placed Jar Jar Binks under the Nocombackie law after a destructive accident involving Nass's personal heyblibber.
